author: kpaulworika
title: Carol McGiffin eyes up return to Loose Women‚Ä¶ ‚Äòbut only if they REMOVE certain panellists‚Äô
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments CAROL McGiffin has her eye on a return to Loose Women, but only if they REMOVE certain regulars from the panel. 
Chatting to the presenter on Twitter, a fan commented: ‚ÄúI Loved U on Loose Women üëç Do u think u would ever go back? Hope u Don,t mind me asking xx‚Äù. Photoshot 4 Carol McGiffin has said she‚Äôd like to return to the Loose Women panel @susanclarkson10 Chin is up as far as it will go‚Ä¶.. and yes, I would go back but only if certain panellist were let go. x 
‚Äî Carol McGiffin (@McGiff) February 21, 2017 
Carol , 56, replied: ‚Äúyes, I would go back but only if certain panellist were let go. x‚Äù. 
And her followers were quick to guess the former Loose Woman was talking about current panellist Katie Price. 
One wrote: ‚Äúobviously Katie Price she‚Äôs awful and makes @loosewomen a joke. Carol was amazing ‚Äì exactly what the shows about.‚Äù 
Carol, who appeared in the straight-talking ITV show for ten years from 2003 to 2013, slammed producers as ‚Äúdesperate‚Äù for hiring the former model last year . Rex Features Carol previously slammed producers as ‚Äòdesperate‚Äô for taking on Katie Price Rex Features 4 Carol was on the show for ten years 
She told a magazine: ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know what she‚Äôs doing there. But she‚Äôs got a lot of Twitter followers, and they‚Äôre desperate for viewers. I can‚Äôt believe those women [panellists] are sitting with her. 
‚ÄúWhere‚Äôs their self-respect? That‚Äôs why the show is so different, because they‚Äôre going for people with a lot of fans.‚Äù related stories CONCERN FOR CAROL Carol McGiffin hints she's struggling to deal with sister Tracy's shock cancer death in worrying tweets No doof doofs here Carol McGiffin boycotts EastEnders after 'passionless' reunion between Michelle Fowler and toyboy lover 'We're stronger than ever' Carol McGiffin defends her 22-year age gap with husband after Kylie Minogue split 'It stressed her greatly' Carol McGiffin slams the NHS for the treatment of her sister Tracy in the days before her death CAROL'S HEARTACHE Carol McGiffin reveals devastating news that her little sister Tracy has been diagnosed with cancer IT DOESN'T SEEM REAL Heartbreak for Carol McGiffin after sister Tracy loses cancer battle four months after shock diagnosis 
Carol‚Äôs latest comments come as fans expressed their concern for the star who admitted she‚Äôs struggling to deal with family issues.
